remarks:
A mixed syllogism inference from a biconditional and an implication. Useful for substituting an antecedent with a definition.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-1993.)

 A mixed syllogism inference from a biconditional and an implication. Useful for substituting an antecedent with a definition.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
sylbi.1 $e |- ( ph <-> ps ) $.
sylbi.2 $e |- ( ps -> ch ) $.
sylbi $p |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
